institution-wrap.institution: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases

funding-group.funding-statement: J.W. and C.J. were supported by PRIME (Program for Research on Immune Modeling and 532 Experimentation), an NIAID-funded Modeling Immunity for Biodefense Center (Grant 533 U19 AI117873). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
